entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 06:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -21

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
